results.headline: ‘Avengers: Endgame’ Review: The Real Heroes Were the Friends We Made Along the Way
results.summary_short: Iron Man, Thor, the Hulk, Captain America and other stars settle scores, tie up loose ends and take a long victory lap in the final chapter of this cycle.

link.suggested_link_text: Read the New York Times Review of Avengers: Endgame

results.headline: ‘Avengers: Infinity War’: It’s Marvel’s Universe. We Just Live in It.
results.summary_short: Infinity? Come on. It’s not even three hours! But there is enough time to get a hunky-Chris showdown (Pratt vs. Hemsworth vs. Evans).

link.suggested_link_text: Read the New York Times Review of Avengers: Infinity War

results.headline: Review: ‘Avengers: Age of Ultron’ Gets the Superband Back Together
results.summary_short: The new installment in the “Avengers” franchise adds characters, including the Scarlet Witch and Quicksilver, even as its familiar heroes fight battles terrestrial and galactic.

link.suggested_link_text: Read the New York Times Review of Avengers: Age Of Ultron

results.headline: Superheroes, Super Battles, Super Egos
results.summary_short: Joss Whedon’s long-awaited superhero opus “The Avengers” arrives with a big cast, frequent battles and abundant banter among its characters.

link.suggested_link_text: Read the New York Times Review of The Avengers

results.headline: Avengers, the (Movie)
results.summary_short: British agents vs. villain with weather machine. Big-time flop.
